value.name: Two Charged With Murder for 2020 Fatal Shooting in Burlington County
value.description: Two people have been charged in connection to a fatal shooting of a 22-year-old woman inside of her apartment in Maple Shade early last year.

value.name: Ex-Con, Teen Nabbed In Double Shooting That Killed Alleged South Jersey Drug Dealer
value.description: A South Jersey ex-con and teenager were captured by members of the U.S. Marshals and a regional task force for their roles in a home invasion robbery and shooting that left one woman dead last year, authorities said Wednesday.
